mapper.insert: insert into temp_ua_group_new (id, grp_type, parent, area_id, name, description, status, create_date, last_update, trStatus) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{grpType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parent,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{trstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select * from temp_ua_group_new where trStatus=0 order by parent
mapper.update: update temp_ua_group_new set trStatus=1 where id =#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
